attributes.action: return to teaching our children to read and write and stop the EYFS nonsense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All children learn at different rates but it needs to be recognised that some children want to learn and their needs are being ignored amongst the current trend for only supporting learning through play. Choice must be available in education from the earliest stage to suit the needs of all parents and, more importantly, the children, not the teachers.
